pullrequest.title: Resolution option functionality for semi-supervised mode

content.raw: The backslash here with no indent on next line is confusing. Refactor the True case for `if self.supervision_type != SUPERVISION_UNSUPERVISED:` into another function so you don't have to indent so much. Then you can also shorten the variable names within that function (it'll just be `conditionalparents_spec` instead of `supervisionlabel_conditionalparents_spec`.
content.html: The backslash here with no indent on next line is confusing. Refactor the True case for if self.supervision_type != SUPERVISION_UNSUPERVISED: into another function so you don't have to indent so much. Then you can also shorten the variable names within that function (it'll just be conditionalparents_spec instead of supervisionlabel_conditionalparents_spec.
